title: PMS 2.0 273 - Week 6 NFL Preview, Josh Cribbs, & Ramon Foster
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys react to the news of a false Covid-19 outbreak in the Indianapolis Colts building, the Patriots having a few potential positive tests in the building, and look ahead to everything that we need to know about in week 6 of the NFL season. Joining the show is 3x Pro Bowler, 2x All-Pro, member of the 2000's NFL All-Decade Team, one of the greatest return specialists of all-time, former Cleveland Brown great, Joshua Cribbs. Pat and Josh chat about Pat being the only kicker to ever tackle him, his foundation, his career as a whole and why he thinks he would've been a perfect fit for this era of football, and his thoughts on this weekends game between the Steelers and Browns, and if this Browns team is different (43:20-1:08:36). Also joining the show is 11 NFL veteran at Guard for the Steelers, "The Big Ragu", Ramon Foster. Pat and Ramon chat about the Steelers and Browns rivalry and how these games just tend to mean more, he breaks down the whole Mason Rudolph/Myles Garrett situation as he was on the field, his thoughts on this weekend's game, and what he see's in Big Ben so far this year (1:08:38-1:27:41). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow as we have reached 1 million subscribers and are giving away $100,000, and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
